fi.harism.curl

Class CurlView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GLSurfaceView
      • fi.harism.curl.CurlView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class CurlView
extends GLSurfaceView
implements CurlRenderer.Observer
    OpenGL ES View.

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CurlView.PageProvider
      Provider for feeding 'book' with bitmaps which are used for rendering pages.

      Observer interface for handling CurlView size changes.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentIndex

        public int getCurrentIndex()
        Get current page index. Page indices are zero based values presenting page being shown on right side of the book.

      • onDrawFrame

        public void onDrawFrame()
        Description copied from interface: CurlRenderer.Observer
        Called from onDrawFrame called before rendering is started. This is intended to be used for animation purposes.
        Specified by:
        onDrawFrame in interface CurlRenderer.Observer

      • onPageSizeChanged

        public void onPageSizeChanged(int width,
                     int height)
        Description copied from interface: CurlRenderer.Observer
        Called once page size is changed. Width and height tell the page size in pixels making it possible to update textures accordingly.
        Specified by:
        onPageSizeChanged in interface CurlRenderer.Observer

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(View view,
              MotionEvent me)

      • setAllowLastPageCurl

        public void setAllowLastPageCurl(boolean allowLastPageCurl)
        Allow the last page to curl.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int color)
        Sets background color - or OpenGL clear color to be more precise. Color is a 32bit value consisting of 0xAARRGGBB and is extracted using android.graphics.Color eventually.

      • setCurrentIndex

        public void setCurrentIndex(int index)
        Set current page index. Page indices are zero based values presenting page being shown on right side of the book. E.g if you set value to 4; right side front facing bitmap will be with index 4, back facing 5 and for left side page index 3 is front facing, and index 2 back facing (once page is on left side it's flipped over). Current index is rounded to closest value divisible with 2.

      • setEnableTouchPressure

        public void setEnableTouchPressure(boolean enableTouchPressure)
        If set to true, touch event pressure information is used to adjust curl radius. The more you press, the flatter the curl becomes. This is somewhat experimental and results may vary significantly between devices. On emulator pressure information seems to be flat 1.0f which is maximum value and therefore not very much of use.

      • setMargins

        public void setMargins(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Set margins (or padding). Note: margins are proportional. Meaning a value of .1f will produce a 10% margin.

      • setPageProvider

        public void setPageProvider(CurlView.PageProvider pageProvider)
        Update/set page provider.

      • setRenderLeftPage

        public void setRenderLeftPage(boolean renderLeftPage)
        Setter for whether left side page is rendered. This is useful mostly for situations where right (main) page is aligned to left side of screen and left page is not visible anyway.

      • setSizeChangedObserver

        public void setSizeChangedObserver(CurlView.SizeChangedObserver observer)
        Sets SizeChangedObserver for this View. Call back method is called from this View's onSizeChanged method.

      • setViewMode

        public void setViewMode(int viewMode)
        Sets view mode. Value can be either SHOW_ONE_PAGE or SHOW_TWO_PAGES. In former case right page is made size of display, and in latter case two pages are laid on visible area.
